Bryn Hughes
Blog CV Courses Contact

My name is Bryn Hughes, and I teach music theory at the Frost School of Music at the University of Miami in Coral Gables, Florida.

My research interests include music cognition, music theory pedagogy, and popular music analysis. My dissertation involved an investigation of harmonic expectation in twelve-bar blues progressions.

I have presented my research at numerous regional, national, and international conferences. For more information, please feel free to peruse my CV.
